text: We'll hear argument next in No. 87-1241, Pennsylvania v. Union Gas Company.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court:
If there hadn't been the exclusive jurisdiction provision in this statute, that is, if a private party could have sued in state court, would the waiver of immunity by Pennsylvania cover that suit?
Well, if Congress had not given exclusive jurisdiction to the federal--
